name: Scoped Salabim Shotgun Supremo
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Visible Light Remodulation Device drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Visible Light Remodulation Device" "257964" #L "Viral Targeting Subunit" "251240" #L "Salabim Shotgun" "253235" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Visible Light Remodulation Device + Viral Targeting Subunit = #L "Projectile Weapon Upgrade" "257969" Note: Viral Targeting Subunit needs to be QL250+ Projectile Weapon Upgrade + Salabim Shotgun = #L "Scoped Salabim Shotgun Supremo" "257141" Note: Salabim Shotgun needs to be QL250+
